      • productivity

        public static void productivity(int runCompletedCnt,
                Timer timer)
        Calculates the botmaster's productivity rate in categories/sec when using Pattern Suggestor to create content.
        Parameters:
        runCompletedCnt - number of categories completed in this run
        timer - tells elapsed time in ms
        See Also:
        AB

      • saveCategory

        public static void saveCategory(Bot bot,
                java.lang.String pattern,
                java.lang.String template,
                java.lang.String filename)
        saves a new AIML category and increments runCompletedCnt
        Parameters:
        bot - the bot the category belongs to
        pattern - the category's pattern (that and topic = *)
        template - the category's template
        filename - the filename for the category.

        Parameters:

      • skipCategory

        public static void skipCategory(Bot bot,
                Category c)
        skip a category. Make the category as "unfinished"
        Parameters:
        bot - the bot the category belogs to
        c - the category

      • abwq

        public static void abwq(Bot bot)

      • ab

        public static void ab(Bot bot)
        magically suggests new patterns for a bot. Reads an input file of sample data called logFile. Builds a graph of all the inputs. Finds new patterns in the graph that are not already in the bot. Classifies input log into those new patterns.
        Parameters:
        bot - the bot to perform the magic on

      • terminalInteraction

        public static void terminalInteraction(Bot bot)
        train the bot through a terminal interaction
        Parameters:
        bot - the bot to train

      • terminalInteractionStep

        public static void terminalInteractionStep(Bot bot,
                           java.lang.String request,
                           java.lang.String textLine,
                           Category c)
        process one step of the terminal interaction
        Parameters:
        bot - the bot being trained.
        request - used when this routine is called by benchmark testSuite
        textLine - response typed by the botmaster
        c - AIML category selected
